  • Uses of Platform in platforms

    Subclasses of Platform in platforms
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    BoostPlatform
    Represents a type of platform that boosts a person when steps on it
    class 
    FallingPlatform
    Represents a type of platform that falls down when a player steps on it
    class 
    ForceBarrier
    Represents a type of platform that a person can move through but stops portal shots
    class 
    Spikes
    A platform type that represents a set of spikes that characters can't step on, otherwise they 'die'.
    class 
    Wall
    A kind of platform that is a wall and the player can't walk through it.
